attributes.action: Return the Rule of Law to the Silent Majority.  More deterrent, less "Human Rights".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prime Minister.  We are sick of the fear on our streets and the false statistics about volence in the UK.  We don't want new gimmicks that won't work.  We want tough action; more prisons, tougher sentances for violence and Anti Social Behaviour, without parole, and a law to instruct judges that convicted criminals and illegal aliens abrogate the protection afforded by Human Rights Legislation.
